<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Protect Companion](/Spells.aspx?ID=975)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** your [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons), or a creature with the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) trait under your control
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You extend your aura, as a magical shield that protects your eidolon or minion. The target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. You gain the following reaction; after using the reaction, the spell ends and you can't cast _protect companion_ again for 10 minutes.

 **Life Block** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The spell's target would take damage; **Effect** Reduce the triggering damage by 10, but you lose 5 Hit Points. Even if this reduces the damage to 0, the target still takes any effects that would come with the damage, such as the poison on a viper's fangs Strike.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The reaction reduces the damage by another 10, and you lose 5 more Hit Points. If you want to lose fewer Hit Points, you can choose to lower the damage reduction and HP lost to what any lower-level version of the spell could do without lowering the spell's actual level.
name: Protect Companion
